title: Requirements Gathering for EntrenamientoBCI Project
description: Gather and document project requirements from stakeholders. This will include understanding functional and non-functional requirements, performance expectations, security concerns, and user interface design preferences. Additionally, research and document any relevant existing solutions or best practices in the field of BCI platforms, focusing on areas such as scalability, accessibility, and real-time data processing. Collaborate with team members to decompose tasks based on roles (task-decomposer), assigning appropriate tasks to frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, qa-tester, and security-specialist as necessary. For the purpose of this RFC, I will focus on gathering and documenting requirements, research, and high-level task decomposition.
